caption: Security Incident
description: Security Incident is an occurrence that actually or potentially jeopardizes the confidentiality, integrity, or availability of an information system or the information the system processes, stores, or transmits or that constitutes a violation or imminent threat of violation of security policies, security procedures, or acceptable use policies. See NIST Security Incident.
name: security_incident

comment.description: Additional user supplied details for updating or closing the incident.

desc.description: The short description of the incident.

end_time.description: The time of the most recent event included in the incident.

start_time.description: The time of the least recent event included in the incident.
